content: this pattern has been captured by archive org 1 raveler loriz 2 has charted 3 this pattern link to pdf --- finished size approx 4 - 4½ inches **materials for a set of 4 ** - cotton yarn - approx size 5 - tapestry needle for weaving in ends **note ** to create a larger coaster of approx 6 inches use a g hook and worsted weight cotton yarn sugar n cream or peaches and creme 1 http //web archive org/web/20060818051918/www spatulagraphics com/krochet/patterns/flwrcstr html 2 http //www ravelry com/people/loriz 3 http //www loriz ca/craft/crochet_flower pdf
